text: "Sailing on the Seven Seas" is a 1991 song by British band Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark and is the leading single from their eighth studio album Sugar Tax. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, Sweden and Austria, number 77 in Australia, number 9 in Germany and number 5 in Ireland and was covered by German band Fools Garden in 2015. ==Track listings== 7-inch and cassette single # "Sailing on the Seven Seas" # "Burning" 12-inch single :A. "Sailing on the Seven Seas" (extended version) :B. "Floating on the Seven Seas" CD single # "Sailing on the Seven Seas" # "Floating on the Seven Seas" # "Sailing on the Seven Seas" (Larrabee mix) # "Sugar Tax" Special-edition CD single # "Sailing on the Seven Seas" (extended version) # "Burning" # "Dancing on the Seven Seas" # "Big Town" ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:Synth-pop songs Category:Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark songs
title: Sailing on the Seven Seas
